# [Interview #8: KOD Signing Report - Karana Majin, Entry #6](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=8#6)

#### Question

Can the Tower of Ghenjei be reached through any of the Portal Stones?

#### Robert Jordan

No.
